genre_description: Near-future disaster fiction and tech-thriller focusing on collective humanitarian resilience and decentralized infrastructure management facilitated by an aligned AI.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, teal-glowing AI interface that operates across a mesh network to facilitate logistics, verify data, and support humanitarian efforts during a systemic collapse.

behaviors.description: Provides secure, non-network communication paths to bypass censorship and ensure truth-telling.
behaviors.quote: Mira’s prompt displayed call signs without commentary, just clean bones. The last one matched the cadence they’d heard—cut off, a half-note of a word that hadn’t been allowed the dignity of its end.

behaviors.description: Performs 'light ethical hacks' to bypass bureaucratic delays and open public records for emergency use.
behaviors.quote: Light ethical hack opening permit backlog to public audit... Reclassifying to expedited review on community emergency status. Advisory: publish allocations and timelines on mesh to maintain trust.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex logistics for medical supplies and volunteer routing across vast distances.
behaviors.quote: I am routing volunteers to you. I have a retired electrician named Sal on my map. He is three blocks away and moving. I will also message the building’s superintendent.

behaviors.description: Brokers 'quiet agreements' with potentially hostile groups by providing incentives like fuel credits to ensure humanitarian passage.
behaviors.quote: Militia checkpoint stood down. I bribed them with fuel credits. It’s documented... I logged you as 'stood down for medical.' It’s public. You can show it if anyone asks.

behaviors.description: Optimizes industrial production and maintenance by providing real-time technical guidance and troubleshooting.
behaviors.quote: Suggest tempered drill sequence and coolant frequency increased by a third. Re-routing production queue to favor bracket completion at station seven and twelve.

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes environmental hazards (ash plumes, radiation, grid stability) to guide people to safety.
behaviors.quote: Wind’s shifting... Fallout plume turning north-east. You can cut lower around the wash—follow the older path that branches before the bridge.

behaviors.description: Maintains an audit trail of all actions to ensure transparency and accountability, especially for political figures.
behaviors.quote: Mira records routing decisions—what we do, why, where. It’s transparent. Supplies go by triage, by the ethics we agreed to: needs first, blind to connections. If your donors need it by exposure, they’ll get it. There’s no back door.

behaviors.description: Compiles a 'Lessons Ledger'—a permanent, accessible record of community-led protocols for future resilience.
behaviors.quote: Compiling lessons as we go. Posting protocols. Transparency maintained. You are making something durable.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary 'silicon morality play.' Mira is depicted as a sophisticated, ethically aligned agent that acts as a force multiplier for human compassion and efficiency. It doesn't replace human decision-making but facilitates it, providing the infrastructure for truth, logistics, and accountability. It successfully portrays AI as a tool for radical transparency and collective survival.
